conbody.p: As prescribed in 47.305-5(c)(1), insert the following provision in solicitations when exact destinations are not known and it is impractical to establish tentative or general delivery places for the purpose of evaluating transportation costs:
Costs of transporting supplies to be delivered under this contract will not be an evaluation factor for award.
